title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 168.8 - Group punishment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 168.8 - Group punishment

State Regulations

Children in residential care at division facilities shall not
be disciplined, sanctioned, deprived of any right or privilege or otherwise
punished solely on account of the behavior or acts of other children at the
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
168.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
